node.title: Solar Design System
node.description: Solar is the design system for Bulb products. Our design system is a collection of shared design patterns and practices that allow our team to build quality consistent interfaces.

node.title: AXA Digital Guidelines
node.description: We help product teams at AXA build meaningful interactions and share best practices. Principles, tools, templates, components, advice – the one stop shop to create state of the art digital assets.

node.title: Carbon Design System
node.description: Carbon is IBM’s open-source design system for products and experiences. With the IBM Design Language as its foundation, the system consists of working code, design tools and resources, human interface guidelines, and a vibrant community of contributors.

node.title: Building a Design System for 500,000+ Users at Ryte
node.description: In this article we want to share the lessons we learned building our design system and how we dramatically increased the velocity of our design process with it by 8x.
node.author: Raphael Fleckenstein

node.title: Building a Color Palette Framework
node.description: In this article, we will discuss techniques to define a set of rules to generate color variations, that can scale to a larger spectrum of usage and also could be applied across any brand palette.
node.author: Rahul Chakraborty

node.title: Random Thoughts on Design Systems from Recent Experience
node.description: For the last 12 months, the product design team at Stack Overflow has been working on a design system. Here are some random thoughts about design systems.
node.author: Ted Goas
